Sentencas: The operating temperature of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack is a very important parameter to be controlled, which impacts the performance of the SOFC due to thermal cycling.
Titulo: SOFC temperature evaluation based on an adaptive fuzzy controller

Sentencas: In this paper, an adaptive fuzzy control method based on an affine nonlinear temperature model is developed to control the temperature of the SOFC within a specified range.
Titulo: SOFC temperature evaluation based on an adaptive fuzzy controller

Sentencas: Fuzzy logic systems are used to approximate nonlinear functions in the SOFC system and an adaptive technique is employed to construct the controller.
Titulo: SOFC temperature evaluation based on an adaptive fuzzy controller

Sentencas: Compared with the traditional fuzzy and proportion-integral-derivative (PID) control, the simulation results show that the designed adaptive fuzzy control method performed much better.
Titulo: SOFC temperature evaluation based on an adaptive fuzzy controller

Sentencas: So it is feasible to build an adaptive fuzzy controller for temperature control of the SOFC.
Titulo: SOFC temperature evaluation based on an adaptive fuzzy controller
